meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Republicans Plan a Push House Republicans, determined to deflect the label of a ''do nothing Congress,'' have several sensitive measures on the agenda as a recess approaches. PAGE A12
Shelling at Island Range Navy shelling, and public protests, have resumed on Vieques Island off Puerto Rico for the first time since an accidental death prompted a year of demonstrations. PAGE A10
Republicans Plan a Push House Republicans, determined to deflect the label of a ''do nothing Congress,'' have several sensitive measures on the agenda as a recess approaches. PAGE A12
Shelling at Island Range Navy shelling, and public protests, have resumed on Vieques Island off Puerto Rico for the first time since an accidental death prompted a year of demonstrations. PAGE A10
3 Drown at City Beaches A 6-year-old girl and her mother drowned after currents pushed them offshore at Rockaway Beach in Queens, and a teenager died off Orchard Beach in the Bronx. PAGE B1
